Description: Worn limestone ostracon with practice text (2 Cor. 4,18; 5,1; Matt. 5,13 and names, animals and crosses).
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (31, pl.24)
Hasitzka 1990 / Neue Texte und Dokumentation zum Koptisch-Unterricht (124-25)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82584) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82584)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 24:1 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
Miscellaneous number: O.Rain.UnterrichtKopt. 190 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
